title: [Self-directed] Advanced Qualitative Research Methodology Course Through Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic research methodologies and expertise in job-specific fields
context.additional_context: Program for Professionals to Acquire Qualitative Research Skills Applicable in Workplace Settings, Optimized for Smartphone-Based Learning Environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ethical dilemmas encountered in the research design process and propose solutions using a reflective practice framework.
Learners can execute a process of collecting and analyzing field observation and interview data using smartphone tools in resource-constrained technological environments.
Learners can develop strategies to strengthen research reciprocity based on their experiences in building relationships with research participants.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
